Item ID4087

Dragon platelegs are a rare piece of armour that require a Defence level of 60 to be worn. They are dropped by most metal dragons, brutal black dragons, Skeletal Wyverns and revenants. They have the same stats as the dragon plateskirt.

Dragon platelegs can be combined with a dragon legs/skirt ornament kit to make gold-trimmed dragon platelegs (g). This cosmetic enhancement won't change the stats in any way.

As with most dragon armour, players cannot make this item using the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-21-11
 Defence bonuses
+68+66+63-4+65

[[File:Dragon platelegs detail.png|left|90px]]
'''Dragon platelegs''' are a rare piece of armour that require a [[Defence]] level of 60 to be worn. They are dropped by most [[metal dragons]], [[brutal black dragon]]s, [[Skeletal Wyvern]]s and [[revenants]]. They have the same stats as the [[dragon plateskirt]].

Dragon platelegs can be combined with a [[dragon legs/skirt ornament kit]] to make gold-trimmed [[dragon platelegs (g)]]. This cosmetic enhancement won't change the stats in any way.

''As with most [[dragon armour]], players cannot make this item using the [[Smithing]] [[skill]].''
